name: Creative Tech Taxonomy
description: This is the top level parent node for everything else.

children.name: Creative Code Frameworks
children.description: This is a collection of nodes related to the concept of Creative Code Frameworks, or areas of programming languages that are typically considered related to creative coding. Not all of these are strictly "Frameworks" but this umbrella term seems to suffice for now.

children.name: Language Type
children.description: This is a category that organizes these frameworks

children.name: Pro AV Hardware and Related Software
